sub_title: Conscious Leadership Consultant | I help leaders, founders & professionals transform their mental & emotional wellbeing so they can have authentic impact, sustainable inner peace & fulfillment.
summary:
Use this link to book a free Leadership Evolution Session:
📆 https://calendly.com/d/4mk-59m-9zy

Hi there!
As leaders, we can all agree we want to drive results while balancing our well-being, our relationships, and making as big a difference in the world as possible. 

And despite the barriers we all know exist, the real problem is we are only aware of what we are aware of, and never of the many blindspots we all have. These create unnecessary stress, conflicts, and impact our relationships, influence, and effectiveness. Without knowing it, we become the bottlenecks holding back our organizations' and teams’ well-being and potential (not to mention our own).

𝐖𝐡𝐨 𝐚𝐦 𝐈? 
I have dedicated the last decade to empowering leaders to transform and expand their consciousness. In doing so, they radically improve their well-being, relationships, and ability to create healthy cultures people love to be part of and give their best for.
13K+ people around the world have gone through my coaching & training programs, online courses, or read my # 1 Amazon Best-Seller: The Mind Canvas. 

𝐒𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐜𝐚𝐬𝐞𝐬
Take Mel's case, who went from being a low-confident manager in one of the holding’s daughter companies, to a C-level executive in the holding. 
“𝘐 𝘥𝘪𝘥𝘯’𝘵 𝘬𝘯𝘰𝘸 𝘐 𝘯𝘦𝘦𝘥𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘵, 𝘣𝘶𝘵 𝘐 𝘯𝘦𝘦𝘥𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘵. 𝘐 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘯𝘬 𝘐’𝘮 𝘢 𝘣𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘦𝘳 𝘮𝘰𝘮, 𝘱𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘯𝘦𝘳, 𝘦𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘦𝘦, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘢 𝘣𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘦𝘳 𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘥𝘦𝘳 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘮𝘺 𝘱𝘦𝘰𝘱𝘭𝘦. 𝘚𝘪𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘺 𝘭𝘪𝘧𝘦-𝘤𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘨𝘪𝘯𝘨.”

Or Mike, a Founder/CEO who realized something needed to change when his company was at risk of bankruptcy. After our call, he knew exactly how he got himself in that position, and had a plan to transform himself, his leadership, and his relationships.
Now, his team is thriving, his health is stronger, and he’s developed a quality of presence that elevates everyone around him.
"𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘙𝘖𝘐 (𝘣𝘰𝘵𝘩 𝘮𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘵𝘢𝘳𝘺 𝘢𝘯𝘥, 𝘮𝘰𝘴𝘵 𝘪𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘢𝘯𝘵𝘭𝘺, 𝘦𝘮𝘰𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘺) 𝘪𝘴 𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘳𝘦𝘥𝘪𝘣𝘭𝘦. 𝘐 𝘸𝘢𝘴 𝘢𝘣𝘭𝘦 𝘵𝘰 𝘴𝘦𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘰𝘴𝘦 2𝘹, 10𝘟, 100𝘟 𝘵𝘩𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘨𝘩 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘫𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘯𝘦𝘺. 𝘐 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘮𝘪𝘴𝘴𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘸𝘪𝘭𝘭 𝘩𝘢𝘷𝘦 𝘢 𝘵𝘳𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘥𝘰𝘶𝘴 𝘪𝘮𝘱𝘢𝘤𝘵 𝘪𝘯 𝘺𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘭𝘪𝘧𝘦."

𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩 𝐄𝐯𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:
Every month I offer a handful of free self-assessments and mentoring sessions for leaders who want to discover their (mind, emotional, and leadership) blindspots and explore how to overcome them and transform.  

Get your free call & assessments here:
📆 https://calendly.com/d/4mk-59m-9zy

awards.title: Award: Leaders of the Future
awards.description: Award granted by the strategy national newspaper to the best 30 graduate students in Business Management across Chile.

awards.title: Excellence Award
awards.description:
A cross functional team of Flexco employees in the US and Chile was awarded the annual Flexco Excellence award 2016 for the big success in introducing a high-end ingeneered product into Latin America. 

In my role as Project Sales & Strategic Accounts Manager for Latin America, I uncovered the perfect prospect, started developing strong relationships,  created interest and commitment for a major long  term project for the replacement of all their transfer points (chutes), help negotiate and close the first order. 

The later implementation by the US team was successful and  this has allowed Flexco to have continuous business in this global company, while opening doors in other major potential customers in Chile and South America. 

One of the client's employees involved in the deal (Port Maintenance Chief) has reported back to Flexco:
“This was the best investment EC-L has made in my 18 years with the company”.

profile_positions.description:
I help spiritual founders & senior leaders transform their mental & emotional well-being so they can have authentic impact, sustainable inner peace & fulfillment.

In the last +10 years, I've had the honor to coach, train and teach to more than 12.000 people, either 1-on-1, in groups, and through online courses.

Use the link below to book your free Leadership Evolution Consultation:
📆 http://bit.ly/3K6Pow5
profile_positions.title: Conscious Leadership Consultant, Coach, Trainer & Speaker

profile_positions.description:
As a CTT Certified Consultant, I use the tools and resources from Barrett Values Centre® to support my clients in their personal, leadership and cultural transformation. 

The tools define an actionable road map that becomes an integral part of a leader's personal development plan and business strategy. 

The tools have been used to measure the values of over 6,000 organisations and 3,000 leaders in 90 countries. They help foster the transformation of corporations, NGOs, government and municipal agencies, communities, schools, and nations. The CTT values assessment instruments are available in over 50 languages.
profile_positions.title: Leadership & Cultural Transformation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Sustainable Network is a London-based start-up that is transforming impact investment and the start-up ecosystem, by funding, supporting and connecting conscious founders and investors. 
 
The current system is broken. It allows too many potentially world-saving ideas and innovations to fail. As a community of purpose and values-driven entrepreneurs, investors and thought leaders, we believe in ensuring that each transformative idea, investment, and person has the greatest chance of succeeding through patient value creation. 
 
Our Mission is to harness the power of community and innovation to support the empowerment of a new wave of conscious businesses and leaders that will enable our transition to “The new Earth”.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Advisor

profile_positions.description:
The Humanity Awareness Initiative (HAI) is a global education and training movement designed to accelerate the evolution of human consciousness and societal wellbeing. 

The central objective of theHumanity Awareness Initiative is to accelerate the evolution of human consciousness by showcasing and creating education and training programs that lead to the emergence of this new worldview. 

The focus of the education and training programs will be on teaching children, teenagers, young adults, mature adults, municipal, business and political leaders as well as guardians of wealth to become conscious – to be aware of how their actions and behaviours impact other people and the planet, and how their thoughts and beliefs impact their mental and physical health.
profile_positions.title: Ambassador

company.name: Barrett Academy for the Advancement of Human Values

profile_positions.company: Barrett Academy for the Advancement of Human Values
profile_positions.description:
The Barrett Academy is an international think-tank that seeks to provide evidence-based practical advice on the evolution of human consciousness.

The purpose of the Barrett Academy is to discover, incubate and develop ideas, concepts, and practices that support the evolution of human consciousness.
profile_positions.title: Fellow member

profile_positions.description:
We, the Values 20 Group (V20), are a global network of values experts and practitioners who actively
interact with the Group of Twenty (G20) to support the progress of its crucial multilateral work. Our
journey began in 2020, focusing on the “Value of Values,” and continued in 2021, focusing on “Values
in Action.” Our global community has generated and will continue to provide policy recommendations
with significant impact that have been offered to the G20 Heads of State for their consideration and
implementation.

We believe that values play a central role in determining people’s behavior and are a crucial
building block for a better future in which everyone may live, work, and thrive with dignity. We endeavor
to assist the G20 in identifying human-centered policy solutions that consider the value of people
and provide measurable policy outcomes.

The V20 2022 has committed to developing and disseminating its contributions to emphasize the
significance of incorporating values and human centered methods into the design and execution
of public policy. Furthermore, the V20 2022 will continue to demonstrate how values play a critical
role in supporting the achievement of the G20 policy goals and realizing the UN 2030 Agenda for
Sustainable Development.
profile_positions.title: Delegate - V20 Wellbeing Taskforce

profile_positions.description:
Training, coaching, and consulting for companies that really believe in developing their people.
We design learning paths that allow for long-lasting behavioral change in individuals, teams and the organization as a whole. 
Focus areas: Leadership, Culture & Collaboration, Change & Transformation.
profile_positions.title: Consultant, Trainer & Coach | Leadership, Communication, Mindset & Behavior Change

profile_positions.description:
In charge of enabling sales performance in key account (Expedia), in world's leading customer management company. 

Performs an in-depth analysis of the whole Customer Agent life-cycle (recruitment, onboarding, training and production), identifying the root-causes of the current state and proposing short and long-term corrective actions. 

Collaborates and coordinates with all other departments to implement corrective actions that have immediate impact on the agents' morale, mindset and sales performance, i.e. workshops, personal and team coaching, promoting and acknowledging excellence. 

Promotes a new culture of trust, effective communication, clarity and alignment. 

Successfully helped the team achieve record sales and be on target on all brands for the first time in almost a year. 

Endorsed by the Expedia Group as Training Facilitator and Coach.
profile_positions.title: Coach & Trainer

profile_positions.description:
In charge of Project Business development in Latin America. 
 
- Strongly positioned the company in the projects industry in Latin America. 
- Opened strategic accounts that continue to bring revenue in different product lines. 
- Introduced a highly engineered technology never before sold in the region, opening a new line of business for the Latin American operation and guaranteeing USD 2M of new revenue in 2 years. 
- Trained engineering and construction professionals across Latin America.

Part of the team awarded with  the annual Flexco Excellence award 2016.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager - Strategic Accounts LatAm

profile_positions.description:
Manages clients’ wealth through Citi’s Wealth Management Process. 
Sells capital assets like stocks, mutual funds, bonds, ETF’s and all the other products and services at Citi, offering a personalized global service in order to fulfill client’s financial needs in the international financial market. 
Manages client’s profit, liquidity and diversification through portfolio monitoring and control. 
Strong development of sales and time management skills.
profile_positions.title: Investment Associate

volunteer_experiences.description: Helped build and maintain the infrastructure at the Mindfulness Project, Khon Kaen, Thailand. During my stay, I had the chance and pleasure of helping other volunteers in their personal development.

Values 20 (V20) is a global community of values experts and practitioners that seeks to actively engage with the Group of Twenty (G20). 

We want to add depth to the understanding of values in public policy with the goal of providing the G20 with evidence-based, human-centered policy solutions that contribute to overcoming global challenges.

Our global community will work through 2021-2022 to produce high-impact policies and recommendations that will be presented to the G20 Heads of State under the Indonesian Presidency for their consideration and activation, as well as leading V20 to become a formal engagement group.
I helped by coaching the speakers improve their talks, presentation skills and mindset for an impactful, well delivered TEDx talk.
